signal_scoring.specificity: Concrete data, names, numbers vs vague claims

flag_thresholds_applied.LOW_SOURCE_QUALITY: Applied when tier 3-4 sources make significance 3+ claims
flag_thresholds_applied.OVERINTERPRETATION: Applied when high significance lacks concrete evidence
flag_thresholds_applied.VAGUE_SIGNAL: Not triggered - no signals with specificity < 30
flag_thresholds_applied.TEMPORAL_CONFUSION: Not triggered - all signals have clear timing
flag_thresholds_applied.SIGNAL_FABRICATION_RISK: Not triggered - no signals meet combined risk criteria
